This Special allows the player character to see objects in remote rooms once they have been viewed via a Viewport. \[DEFINED ON VIEWPORT EXTENSION\] **`QViewport`**` :   `[`Special`](../object/Special.html)

canSee (a, b)

viewport.t[257]

When the VIEWPORT EXTENSION is in use, make objects in remote rooms visisble once they have been viewed via a Viewport.
